stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0:1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({-1:1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-5:1.0})

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {-(0 if usage_decision == 'ban' else 0.1 if usage_decision == 'restrict' else 1)*(0 if carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else 0.5 if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' else 10)*(1 if human_exposure == 'low' else 10 if human_exposure == 'medium' else 100):1.0}
lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {0:0.0,1:1.0} if (economic_value + cancer_cost)>=0 else {0:1.0,1:0.0}
